nodes.text: A blockade of the Imperial Navy was active during the Imperial Era and under the command of Moff Boyse from his flagship Exchequer. The Galactic Empire's blockade over the planet Scipio consisted of Star Destroyers, which ensured that the Core Five of the InterGalactic Banking Clan were loyal to the Empire. Despite this, Scipio became a hotbed of espionage and insurgent activity, as the Muuns secretly opposed the Empire.
